briefTitle: GSK1550188 A 52 Week Study of Belimumab Versus Placebo in the Treatment of Subjects With Systemic Lupus Erythematosus (SLE) Located in Northeast Asia
officialTitle: GSK1550188 A 52 Week Study of Belimumab Versus Placebo in the Treatment of Subjects With Systemic Lupus Erythematosus (SLE) Located in Northeast Asia
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of belimumab in addition to standard therapy compared to placebo in subjects in Northeast Asia with systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE) over a 52 week period.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percent of Participants Achieving Systemic Lupus Erythematosus (SLE) Responder Index (SRI) Response Rate at Week 52 for Double-blind Phase.
